dict.acceptation: 主要地；从根本上说；基本，基本上；总的说来；

sent.orig: The sort of basically relies on to work artificially phenomenon in the past is changed basically.
sent.trans: 过去的那种主要靠人工作业的现象基本改变。

sent.orig: Because basically normal eating vegetarian, -sugar, -fat and-salt foods are basically not in his account.
sent.trans: 因为平常基本上都是吃素菜，高糖、高脂肪和高盐食品基本上都不在他的考虑范围之内。

sent.orig: If Beijing basically is produced 2 model half shoe, shanghai basically is produced 2 model shoe.
sent.trans: 如北京主要产二型半鞋，上海主要产二型鞋。

sent.orig: He'd been basically on-duty 24 hours a day for the last three weeks.
sent.trans: 过去三周里他都每天连续24小时当值。

sent.orig: The system basically lets each state share its vehicle registration and identification data with the others.
sent.trans: 该系统基本上可以让每个国家分享自己的车辆登记证和身份证的数据与其他。
